briefTitle: Evaluation of Novartis Access; a Non-communicable Disease (NCD) Access Initiative
officialTitle: Evaluation of Novartis Access; a Non-communicable Disease (NCD) Access Initiative
conditions: Cardiovascular Disease, Diabetes Type II, Breast Cancer, Asthma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Availability of Novartis Access medicines and equivalents at public and private non-profit facilities: proportion of Novartis Access NCD medicines and equivalents that a facility has in stock on the day of data collection
eligibilityCriteria:
Household Inclusion Criteria:

* At least one household member diagnosed and prescribed treatment for an NCD condition targeted by Novartis Access (asthma; diabetes; breast cancer; hypertension)
* Eligible household members must be at least 18 years of age to participate

Household Exclusion Criteria:

* Households who are unwilling to provide informed consent
* Households that plan to move from their location during the two year period of the study
